jenes.chromosome.codings.IntCoding

jenes.chromosome.codings.IntCoding Class Reference

 IntCoding ()
final Integer decode (final int bits)
final int encode (final Integer value)

Detailed Description

Represents an int coding with 32 bits two-complement representation. The coding is direct. The range representable is [-2147483648,2147483647].

Version:
1.2
Since:
1.0
